programme.title: SportsCenter with Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: Scott Van Pelt hosts ESPN's signature news and highlights show, with interviews and unique segments including 'Senior Night,' to recognize high-school and college athletes.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia.

programme.title: Yankees-Dodgers: An Uncivil War
programme.desc: Chronicling baseball's 1977 and '78 World Series between New York and L.A., and a rivalry filled with colorful characters, seismic controversies and unforgettable moments. Interviews include Reggie Jackson, Dusty Baker, Ron Guidry, Steve Garvey and more. Directed by Fritz Mitchell and narrated by Rob Lowe.

programme.title: Jackie Robinson: Get To The Bag
programme.desc: An immersive documentary experience inspired by the life of Jackie Robinson told by the next generation of baseball fans and the sound of hip hop.

programme.title: David Ortiz: The Legend of Fall
programme.desc: Big Papi was at his best when it mattered, heralded as the greatest playoff clutch hitter of all-time. Filmed over the course of just six weeks, David Ortiz: Legend Of The Fall documents the three time world champion's recent induction in the baseball Hall of Fame â€“ capturing the lead-up to this momentous event, the actual ceremony and the afterglow of his enshrinement.

programme.title: Searching For Shohei: An Interview Special
programme.desc: A never before seen look at MLB superstar Shohei Ohtani, told through the eyes of his biggest fan: Fox Sports' Ben Verlander.

programme.title: NASCAR Race Hub
programme.desc: Daily motor-sports discussion and interviews from the "hub" of NASCAR in Charlotte.

programme.title: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: The Pala Casino 400 from Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, Cal. The Cup Series takes its final laps on the two-mile layout at this track that debuted in 1997, with plans to convert it to a short track. Californian Kyle Larson (No. 5 car) held off Austin Dillon (No. 3) for the win last year. Both drivers crashed out of last week's Daytona 500, won by Ricky Stenhouse Jr. (No. 47).

programme.title: Back To School With Gus Johnson
programme.desc: Chronicling long-time Fox Sports broadcaster Gus Johnson's mid-life decision to enroll at Harvard as an extension of his lifelong love of learning and social impact.

programme.title: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed
programme.desc: Skip and Shannon: Undisputed is a daily sports debate show starring Skip Bayless and Shannon Sharpe, and moderated by Jen Hale. Every day Skip and Shannon will give their unfiltered, incisive, passionate opinions on the biggest sports topics of the day.

programme.desc: Emmanuel Acho, Joy Taylor, and LeSean McCoy bring a fun, passionate, smart, and energetic discussion to the biggest sports topics of the day.
